name: landb
description: Save time with land-js Database, local host only, Insert, get, update and delete data from your app.
readme:
# landb Local Database Storage

landb database will help you storage data in you app easy, this functions was create by Gustavo Garcia, Hi think mongodb and others database are little confused to use. landb is Perfect for Electron apps

## Getting ready

This is almost ready you have to wait for the final version, this is only for debugging.

## Functions
* Create database name example: company
* Create database table example: employers
* Create schema example: name,lastname,username,email.
* Storage data in your local server
* Insert data
* Update data
* Delete data using guionbajo
* Find data using guionbajo

## Instructions

Coming up... soon :)
